item.description:
All,

I found that the website here listed this weeks meeting as taking place at 8pm. This is incorrect. The meeting will take place at 7pm

I hope you can make it. We will have Yong Qu. from Alfresco and a number of folks who have done large Alfresco installations in attendance.

7PM at Christoper's in Porter SQ (Right across from the T Stop)

Directions to Christopher's,
1920 Mass Avenue, Cambridge, MA 02140

http://www.christophe...


http://maps.google.co...

Christopher?s is located right next to the Porter Square T stop. There is also plenty of parking available in the area (check the mall across the street.). I hope you will join us for food, drink, friends and Alfresco.

617-834-2781
item.how_to_find_us: We will be upstairs -- Ask the Host for Alfresco Group!

group.name: New England Alfresco Content Management User Group

item.name: New England Alfresco Content Management User Group April Meeting
